overview: I Am Virgin released by Cheezy Flicks Entertainment is a campy B-movie about vampires, sex and a virgin. Starring Adam Davis, co-written by David Wester, produced and co-written by Sean Skelding, with a cameo by Ron Jeremy.  Directed by	Sean Skelding Produced by	Shawn Justice Sean Skelding Written by	Sean Skelding David Wester Starring	Adam Davis Music by	Brad McCray Rody Ortega Cinematography	Michael Lindberg Editing by	David Wester Studio	Cheezy Flicks Entertainment Distributed by	Cheezy Flicks Entertainment Release date(s)	 January 28, 2010 Country	United States Language	English Budget	$100,000
title: I Am Virgin
